name: Laal Note Shaak Bhaja
extraInfo: This recipe goes best with hot rice.
steps: Clean and shred the Lal note shaak, then wash it thoroughly with water. Drain water and keep aside.
Heat oil in a pan, add black cumin, dry red chiilie broken into two halves.
Add chopped onions and stirfry till the onions are half done.
Add garlic to the mixture and saut√© till golden brown.
Add the shaak and stirfry for 2 minutes.
Add turmeric powder, salt and stirfry for 5 minutes.
Add sugar and stirfry till most of the water has evaporated from the mixture.
Reduce flame and stir continuously for another 5 minutes or till the mixture is fully dry.
Your LAL NOTE SHAAK BHAJA is ready to be served.
